en: Push the desks into the green zones to complete the puzzle
zh_TW: 把桌子推到綠色區域以完成謎題

en: Press {0} to interact with the environment
zh_TW: 點擊 {0} 以與環境互動

en: To use an item, stand close and select the item from the menu ({0})
zh_TW: 要使用物品的話，靠近並從選單選擇物品({0})

en: Press {0} to open the menu and see your items
zh_TW: 點擊 {0}以開啟選單並瀏覽你的物品
移動時，按住 {0} 以奔跑

en: Crows can save your game. Save often, since the future is uncertain
zh_TW: 烏鴉可以用來儲存你的遊戲。經常儲存，因為未來充滿不確定性

en: Hold {0} while moving to climb up the stairs
zh_TW: 移動時按住 {0} 以攀爬樓梯

en: Press {0} when the indicator matches the green zone
zh_TW: 當游標移動到綠色區域時點擊 {0}
